Kind Regards,
WEX Motorpass
WEX Motorpass Benefits
Extensive acceptance WEX Motorpass gives you access to one of Australia’s largest fuel networks
No more receipts
WEX Motorpass statements are approved by the Australian Tax Office
Reduced administration Transactions are processed in real time at the terminal as opposed to some other competitors that post sales vouchers for processing
WEX Motorpass’ superior fuel card acceptance delivers savings beyond the fuel price. Visit motorpass.com.au/savings calculator to learn more
The offer ends 11:59pm AEST 31st August 2018 and is available by applying online at motorpass.com.au or by calling 1300 591 431. It is available to new customers only and cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer. The offer applies to each card under your WEX Motorpass account, and applies only to fuel purchases. Discount does not apply to LPG fuels. Discounts are available off the pump price at all WEX Motorpass participating service stations, excluding Coles Express. 1 cent discount is available from the account opening date. A 1% transaction fee applies to purchases at Coles Express only, with no transaction fees at any other service stations. Applicants and authorised representatives must be over 18 years, have an ABN and use their vehicle for business purposes to apply. The standard WEX Motorpass terms and conditions and fees and charges apply. Please see motorpass.com.au/terms-and-conditions.
